channel.title: Disaster Gentrification on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Disaster Gentrification on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Real Estate Speculators Are Swooping In to Buy Disaster-Hit Homes
item.description: “We buy homes” companies are procuring disaster-damaged properties for cheap. Survivors say they’re taking advantage of tragedy.
